postAbout.headline: About Us
postAbout.paragraph:
Borja Landscaping & Construction Inc. is a full-service company providing design, installation, construction and maintenance throughout Long Island, New york.

Our expert staff have the knowledge it takes to build the perfect landscape, transform and mantain your garden ideas that fits your property budget through all four seasons by reliable experts.
